column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Jinya is located proximal to the downtown area
column2: and consequently parking can be tricky. You can park in the free garage on the same block
column3: which is shared with other businesses and 24 Hour Fitness. If you don't see the garage at first
column4: just circle the block until you spot an entrance. When I came around 5:30 PM on a Wednesday
column6: people come and go fairly frequently so just circle around a bit
column7: and I'm sure you can easily snag a spot.
